entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:31 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
